title: Fix gallery lightbox and add location text

requirements.text: Fix the photo lightbox in the GallerySection component so that clicking on any photo in the 'Saalana Jalsa 2026' album correctly opens and displays the full-size image. Investigate and resolve any broken image paths, missing state updates, or incorrect lightbox open/close logic that prevents photos from showing when clicked.

quotes: सालाना जलसे के फोटो पर क्लिक करने से दिख नहीं रहा है उसे सही करे

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking any photo thumbnail in the Saalana Jalsa 2026 gallery opens a lightbox overlay displaying the full-size image
The lightbox can be closed by clicking outside or pressing Escape
Keyboard navigation (left/right arrows) between photos works correctly in the lightbox
No broken image or blank overlay appears when a photo is clicked

requirements.text: In all locations where 'Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee' appears as a title or subtitle (HeroSection, Header, Footer, index.html, and any other components), append 'Maharajganj Jainpur' after it, so the full text reads 'Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee Maharajganj Jainpur'.

quotes: मस्जिद ए गौसिया वेलफेयर कमिटी के बाद महराजगंज जैनपुर जोड़े

acceptanceCriteria: Every visible instance of 'Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee' on the page is followed by 'Maharajganj Jainpur'
The page title in index.html also reflects the updated name
The layout accommodates the longer text without overflow or wrapping issues

constraints: Do not alter the existing color palette, font choices, or overall visual design
Do not modify files listed in frontend.immutablePaths
nonGoals: Adding new photos or gallery albums
Changes to backend data models or endpoints
Any new sections or features beyond the two fixes requested
